spec_data.Name: perl-Locale-Currency-Format
spec_data.Description:
Locale::Currency::Format is a light-weight Perl module that enables Perl
code to display monetary values in the formats recognized internationally
and/or locally.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:58:17 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl functions for formatting monetary values
